name: @techzolab/zodit-react
description: Zodit is awesome and usefully wysiwyg editor with filebrowser
author: Nazrul Islam Nadeem <nazrul.devs@gmail.com> (https://techzolab.net/)

scripts.newversion: npm run lint && npm update && rm -rf build/ && npm run build && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run github && npm publish --access public ./
scripts.demo: cd examples && export NODE_ENV=development && webpack-dev-server --config ./webpack.config.js --mode development --port 4000 --hot --inline
scripts.githubtag: git add --all  && git commit -m "New version $npm_package_version. " && git tag $npm_package_version && git push --tags origin HEAD:main
scripts.github: git add --all  && git commit -m "New version $npm_package_version. " && git push --tags origin HEAD:main
